remarks: Two subspaces commute iff their projections commute.  Lemma 4 of [Kalmbach] p. 67.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjclem1.1 $e |- G e. CH $.
pjclem1.2 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjci $p |- ( G C_H H <-> ( ( projh ` G ) o. ( projh ` H ) ) = ( ( projh ` H ) o. ( projh ` G ) ) ) $.
